thread.title: hattie Stokes

author: hattie Stokes
title: hattie Stokes
text: I'm contacting you about my Feb. 21, 2017 order, which I should have received by now! If there was any problem, you should have contacted me immediately. Your website said shipping in 3-7 days, and it's been more than that! I need the contacts ASAP, and ask that you follow up to see what's going on please. Thanks in advance for your immediate attention regarding my dilemma!
